snippet: Representative Frank Lucas of Oklahoma has tried to bridge the gap between agriculture-centric Republicans like himself and those who worry the farm bill would look like too much Republican spending.
abstract: Republican Rep Frank D Lucas, chairman of the House Agriculture Committee, has found himself at the center of an intraparty standoff on the farm bill; Lucas is attempting to find middle ground between agriculture-centric Republicans who fully support the bill and those who feel it will expose the party to accusations of excessive spending.
lead_paragraph: Representative Frank Lucas of Oklahoma has tried to bridge the gap between agriculture-centric Republicans like himself and those who worry the farm bill would look like too much Republican spending.

headline.seo: Riding Herd on G.O.P. Effort to Produce a Farm Bill in the House
headline.main: Riding Herd on G.O.P. Effort to Produce a Farm Bill in the House
headline.print_headline: Riding Herd on G.O.P. Effort to Produce a Farm Bill in the House
